Augmented Reality (AR) Try-On Feature: Create an AR try-on feature that allows customers to virtually try on clothes and accessories directly from the shopping cart. Using a smartphone camera, customers can see how the items would look on them without having to physically try them on. This feature can increase customer satisfaction and reduce returns. Confidence Score: 0.8

Personalized Recommendations Engine: Develop a machine learning-based recommendation engine that suggests products to customers based on their shopping history, preferences, and behavior. This can help customers discover new products and increase the chances of them completing their purchase. Confidence Score: 0.9

Mobile Payment Integration: Integrate mobile payment options such as Apple Pay, Google Wallet, and Samsung Pay to make the checkout process more convenient and secure. Customers can save their payment information for future purchases, reducing friction and increasing the chances of a sale. Confidence Score: 0.9

Virtual Wardrobe: Create a virtual wardrobe feature that allows customers to upload images of their clothing items and create a virtual closet. Customers can then mix and match items, see how they would look together, and get styling suggestions. This feature can help customers make informed purchasing decisions and reduce the chances of returns. Confidence Score: 0.8

Gamified Rewards Program: Develop a gamified rewards program that incentivizes customers to complete their purchases. Customers can earn points or discounts for completing certain actions such as completing their purchase, referring friends, or leaving reviews. This feature can increase customer engagement and loyalty, leading to more completed purchases. Confidence Score: 0.9
